a73a7c1a182d42dd80c356a4887fb175.original_text: Harry Dresden, Chicago’s only professional wizard, has always managed to save the day—but, in this powerful entry in the #1 New York Times bestselling Dresden Files, can he save himself? One year. 365 days. Twelve months. Harry Dresden has been through a lot, and so has his city. After Harry and his allies narrowly managed to save Chicago from being razed to the ground, everything is different—and it’s not just the current lack of electricity. In the battle, Harry lost people he cared about. And
a73a7c1a182d42dd80c356a4887fb175.translated_text: 芝加哥唯一的专业巫师哈利·德累斯顿（ Harry Dresden ）一直设法挽救了这一天，但在《纽约时报》畅销书《德累斯顿档案》（ Dresden Files ）排名第一的强大条目中，他能拯救自己一年， 365天。十二个月。哈利·德累斯顿经历了很多，他的城市也经历了很多。在哈利和他的盟友勉强设法拯救芝加哥免于被夷为平地之后，一切都不同了--不仅仅是目前的电力短缺。在战斗中，哈利失去了他关心的人，

795d581affd94733b685b3fb637ce4b4.original_text: From the #1 New York Times bestselling author of I’m Glad My Mom Died comes a sad, funny, thrilling novel about sex, consumerism, class, desire, loneliness, the internet, rage, intimacy, power, and the (oftentimes misguided) lengths we’ll go to in order to get what we want. A MOST ANTICIPATED BOOK OF THE YEAR: The New York Times, USA Today, Bustle, Town & Country Waldo is ravenous. Horny. Blunt. Naive. Wise. Impulsive. Lonely. Angry. Forceful. Hurting. Perceptive. 795d581affd94733b685b3fb637ce4b4.translated_text: 《纽约时报》排名第一的畅销书作家《我很高兴我妈妈死了》（ I 'm Glad My Mom Died ）讲述了一本关于性、消费主义、阶级、欲望、孤独、互联网、愤怒、亲密、权力以及（常常被误导的）长篇大论的悲伤、有趣、激动人心的小说，以获得我们想要的东西。年度最受期待的书籍：《纽约时报》、《今日美国》、《喧嚣、城镇与乡村》。淫荡。直率。天真。明智。冲动。孤独。愤怒。有力。痛苦。敏锐。无休止的渴望。而瘦

0b4599ad768745f90d8e150647309b82.original_text: The unforgettable memoir by the late Virginia Roberts Giuffre, the woman who dared to take on Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell The world knows Virginia Roberts Giuffre as Jeffrey Epstein and Ghislaine Maxwell’s most outspoken victim: the woman whose decision to speak out helped send both serial abusers to prison, whose photograph with Prince Andrew catalyzed his fall from grace. But her story has never been told in full, in her own words—until now. In April 2025, Giuffre took her own life.
0b4599ad768745f90d8e150647309b82.translated_text: 弗吉尼亚·罗伯茨·朱弗尔（ Virginia Roberts Giuffre ）是已故的弗吉尼亚·罗伯茨·朱弗尔（ Virginia Roberts Giuffre ）的回忆录，她敢于挑战杰弗里·爱泼斯坦（ Jeffrey Epstein ）和吉斯琳·麦克斯韦（ Ghislaine Maxwell ）。全世界都知道弗吉尼亚·罗伯茨·朱弗尔（ Virginia Roberts Giuffre ）是杰弗里·爱泼斯坦（ Jeffrey Epstein ）和吉斯琳·麦克斯韦（ Ghislaine Maxwell ）最直言不讳的受害但直到现在，她的故事从未用她自己的话被完整地讲述过。2025年4月， Giuffre结束了自己的生命。

daf37db9ee0e0c96315d85346d955b4a.translated_text: 最具特色和最有趣的政治家之一，参议员约翰·肯尼迪（来自路易斯安那州） -被Politico誉为“美国最引人注目的参议员” -在这场对华盛顿及其精英居民的严厉诙谐的罢免中，他的洞察力（和滑稽）呈现了政治生活的荒谬。《How to Test Negative for Stupid》为参议员提供了华盛顿的笑话指南，其中点缀着他对路易斯安那州各种问题的想法和有关生活的幽默故事
